Ingredients.1: 3 pounds bone-in chicken breast halves, with skin

Ingredients.8: 2 (6 ounce) packages long grain and wild rice mix

Ingredients.11: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Directions.1: Place chicken breasts in a large pot with water, wine, salt, curry powder, onion, and celery. Cover, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, and simmer for 1 hour. Remove from heat, strain (reserving broth), and refrigerate to cool. Remove chicken meat from bone, and cut into bite size pieces.

Directions.2: Prepare the rice mix according to package directions. Replace the specified amount of liquid with the same amount of the reserved broth.

Directions.3: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.

Directions.4: In a large bowl combine the chicken, rice, and mushrooms. Blend in the sour cream and soup. Spoon into the prepared baking dish.

Directions.5: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour.
